text: geunal hananimkkeseo geudeul moduleul buhwalsikisieo geudeul-ege geudeul-i haenghaessdeon geos-eul allyeo jusil geos-ila. hananimkkeseoneun geugeos(geudeul-ui haeng-wi)eul gijaehasyeossgo geudeul-eun geugeos-eul mang-gaghayeossdeola. hananimkkeseoneun modeun geos-eul jeung-eonhasineun bun-ila
